messages.globalEventAdded: A global meeting has been created and is visible in the global calendar.
messages.personalEventAdded: The private meeting has been created and is visible in your calendar.
messages.notificationAdded: The notification has been added to the list. Fill in the required fields and save the meeting to make the modification permanent.

messages.unitsInfo: Minutes and times (as units) are only available for selection after entering a meeting start date.
messages.eventDeletionContent: This operation is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete the selected meeting?
